nodes.bodyText:
Honestly I would rather recommend making a seperate PiglinBarterDrop interface for this instead. (You can also just make it extend RandomMobDrop for simplicity).
Because this is a bit un-intuitive.
Also it may be wise to create some variables here, for the piglin for example as this all appears a bit cluttered.

Make a new author tag below this one.
You can have multiple, no need to use a comma here
*piglin
*PiglinListener
Also I forgot the method was called getMobDropChance(). Maybe not extend that and just make a method called getBarteringLootChance() instead?
This comment is no longer needed here

@@ -26,7 +27,15 @@
     /**
      * Implement this method to make the object have a variable chance of being
      * added to the dropList when {@link EntityType} (specified in the recipe)
-     * is killed by the {@link Player}
+     * is killed by the {@link Player} for a MOB_DROP {@link RecipeType}.
+     * 
+     * Alternatively if the {@link RecipeType} is set to BARTER_DROP the item
+     * will then have its % chance to be dropped only by bartering with the
+     * Piglin creatures.
+     * 
+     * It is recommended that this chance is kept reasonably low to feel like
+     * a vanilla drop as a 100% chance will completely override all piglin 
+     * barter drops.  (NOTE: this feature only exists in 1.16+)

nodes.bodyText:
"provides an easy method for adding a % chance to drop for an SlimefunItem"
This doesn't make sense. Also this is one entire sentence. That's a long ass sentence. Also, grammar pls

"make the object have a..."
*Make the SlimefunItem have a...
Then you can remove the useless addition below and just state it's used with the BARTER_DROP RecipeType
This note should really be on a new line, hold and not have brackets. This just seems weird.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,39 @@
+package io.github.thebusybiscuit.slimefun4.core.attributes;
+
+import org.bukkit.entity.EntityType;
+import org.bukkit.entity.Player;
+import org.bukkit.event.entity.EntityDeathEvent;
+import org.bukkit.event.entity.EntityDropItemEvent;
+
+import io.github.thebusybiscuit.slimefun4.implementation.items.misc.BasicCircuitBoard;
+import io.github.thebusybiscuit.slimefun4.implementation.listeners.MobDropListener;
+import me.mrCookieSlime.Slimefun.Lists.RecipeType;
+import me.mrCookieSlime.Slimefun.Objects.SlimefunItem.SlimefunItem;
+
+/**
+ * This interface, when attached to a {@link SlimefunItem}, provides an easy method for adding
+ * a % chance to drop for an {@link SlimefunItem} on {@link EntityItemDropEvent}, this chance is 0-100
+ * and used in conjunction with the BARTER_DROP {@link RecipeType}.
+ * 
+ * @author dNiym
+ *
+ * @see PiglinListener
+ * 
+ */
+@FunctionalInterface
+public interface PiglinBarterDrop extends ItemAttribute {
+
+    /**
+     * Implement this method to make the object have a variable chance of being
+     * dropped by Piglins when bartering with them. This interface should be used
+     * with a {@link SlimefunItem} item that has the BARTER_DROP {@link RecipeType}.
+     * 
+     * It is recommended that this chance is kept reasonably low to feel like
+     * a vanilla drop as a 100% chance will completely override all Piglin 
+     * barter drops.  (NOTE: this feature only exists in 1.16+)

nodes.bodyText: The integer chance (0-100%) this SlimefunItem has to drop.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,39 @@
+package io.github.thebusybiscuit.slimefun4.core.attributes;
+
+import org.bukkit.entity.EntityType;
+import org.bukkit.entity.Player;
+import org.bukkit.event.entity.EntityDeathEvent;
+import org.bukkit.event.entity.EntityDropItemEvent;
+
+import io.github.thebusybiscuit.slimefun4.implementation.items.misc.BasicCircuitBoard;
+import io.github.thebusybiscuit.slimefun4.implementation.listeners.MobDropListener;
+import me.mrCookieSlime.Slimefun.Lists.RecipeType;
+import me.mrCookieSlime.Slimefun.Objects.SlimefunItem.SlimefunItem;
+
+/**
+ * This interface, when attached to a {@link SlimefunItem}, provides an easy method for adding
+ * a % chance to drop for an {@link SlimefunItem} on {@link EntityItemDropEvent}, this chance is 0-100
+ * and used in conjunction with the BARTER_DROP {@link RecipeType}.
+ * 
+ * @author dNiym
+ *
+ * @see PiglinListener
+ * 
+ */
+@FunctionalInterface
+public interface PiglinBarterDrop extends ItemAttribute {
+
+    /**
+     * Implement this method to make the object have a variable chance of being
+     * dropped by Piglins when bartering with them. This interface should be used
+     * with a {@link SlimefunItem} item that has the BARTER_DROP {@link RecipeType}.
+     * 
+     * It is recommended that this chance is kept reasonably low to feel like
+     * a vanilla drop as a 100% chance will completely override all Piglin 
+     * barter drops.  (NOTE: this feature only exists in 1.16+)
+     * 
+     * @return The integer chance (0-100%) {@link SlimefunItem} has to drop.

nodes.bodyText: Not exactly sure why the period was removed here.
You can just do {@link RecipeType#MOB_DROP}
You make an Piglin variable but then only use it once (and use e.getEntity another). You also don't actually even use any methods in this class...
made piglin a variable based on a request from TheBusyBiscuit...  So should I or should I not make a variable? or just use e.getEntity()

Having a variable is fine but, you just use the Piglin class for no reason. You also only use it once and then still have an e.getEntity
Use the variable everywhere or use the longer calls.

You're doing a random number between 0-99 and then a greater OR equal). If I had a 1% chance this would actually be 2% (0 and 1).
Fix pls

This doesn't make sense anymore. "killed by the Player RecipeType#MOB_DROP".
Should probably be mentioned above when the entity and recipe is mentioned.
fixed
RecipeType#BARTER_DROP
also fixed
You could also just do e.getItemDrop().setItemStack(sfi.getItem().clone()) here, this would probably cause less issues with other plugins.
Why [1; 101] here?

Per walshy
#2136 (comment)
You can also just do greater than random(100). I think the [1; 100] here is a bit confusing, might even be helpful to add a comment there too
done
You could mark EntityDropItemEvent here as a link too.
Handled
You could mark SlimefunItem here as a link too.
done
You could mark Piglin here as a link too.
of course
You could mark Piglin here as a link too.
your wish is my codemand
You could mark SlimefunItem here as a link too.

@@ -0,0 +1,39 @@
+package io.github.thebusybiscuit.slimefun4.core.attributes;
+
+import org.bukkit.entity.EntityType;
+import org.bukkit.entity.Player;
+import org.bukkit.event.entity.EntityDeathEvent;
+import org.bukkit.event.entity.EntityDropItemEvent;
+
+import io.github.thebusybiscuit.slimefun4.implementation.items.misc.BasicCircuitBoard;
+import io.github.thebusybiscuit.slimefun4.implementation.listeners.MobDropListener;
+import me.mrCookieSlime.Slimefun.Lists.RecipeType;
+import me.mrCookieSlime.Slimefun.Objects.SlimefunItem.SlimefunItem;
+
+/**
+ * This interface, when attached to a {@link SlimefunItem}, provides a variable (0-100%) chance for
+ * a {@link SlimefunItem} to be dropped by a piglin on {@link EntityItemDropEvent}. 
+ * 
+ * @author dNiym
+ *
+ * @see PiglinListener
+ * 
+ */
+@FunctionalInterface
+public interface PiglinBarterDrop extends ItemAttribute {
+
+    /**
+     * Implement this method to make this SlimefunItem have a variable chance of being
+     * dropped by Piglins when bartering with them. This interface should be used
+     * with the {@link RecipeType#BARTER_DROP}.
+     */
+    
+    /** It is recommended that this chance is kept reasonably low to feel like
+     * a vanilla drop as a 100% chance will completely override all Piglin 
+     * barter drops.  (NOTE: this feature only exists in 1.16+)
+     * 
+     * @return The integer chance (0-100%) this SlimefunItem has to drop.

+package io.github.thebusybiscuit.slimefun4.core.attributes;
+
+import org.bukkit.entity.EntityType;
+import org.bukkit.entity.Player;
+import org.bukkit.event.entity.EntityDeathEvent;
+import org.bukkit.event.entity.EntityDropItemEvent;
+
+import io.github.thebusybiscuit.slimefun4.implementation.items.misc.BasicCircuitBoard;
+import io.github.thebusybiscuit.slimefun4.implementation.listeners.MobDropListener;
+import me.mrCookieSlime.Slimefun.Lists.RecipeType;
+import me.mrCookieSlime.Slimefun.Objects.SlimefunItem.SlimefunItem;
+
+/**
+ * This interface, when attached to a {@link SlimefunItem}, provides a variable (0-100%) chance for
+ * a {@link SlimefunItem} to be dropped by a piglin on {@link EntityItemDropEvent}. 
+ * 
+ * @author dNiym
+ *
+ * @see PiglinListener
+ * 
+ */
+@FunctionalInterface
+public interface PiglinBarterDrop extends ItemAttribute {
+
+    /**
+     * Implement this method to make this SlimefunItem have a variable chance of being
+     * dropped by Piglins when bartering with them. This interface should be used
+     * with the {@link RecipeType#BARTER_DROP}.
+     */
+    
+    /** It is recommended that this chance is kept reasonably low to feel like

+     * barter drops.  (NOTE: this feature only exists in 1.16+)
+     * 
+     * @return The integer chance (0-100%) this SlimefunItem has to drop.
